targets.expr: sum(max by(stepType, module) (last_over_time(node_execution_active_count_per_module_and_stepType{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", stepType!~"NG_SECTION|NG_SECTION_WITH_ROLLBACK_INFO|STAGES_STEP|PIPELINE_SECTION|APPROVAL_STAGE|NG_SECTION_STEP|NG_SPEC_STEP|DEPLOYMENT_STAGE_STEP|IntegrationStageStepPMS|CISPECPMS|NG_EXECUTION|NG_FORK|COMBINED_ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|CUSTOM_STAGE|STEP_GROUP"}[5m])))

panels.description: This evaluates the number of executions that have decreased/increased within 10 mins.

targets.expr: delta(max(rate(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env"}[5m]))[15m:])

panels.title: Change in rate of executions per 10 minute

panels.description: Total pipeline executions currently running at this moment in time.

targets.expr: sum(avg by(accountId) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env"}[1m]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Current Executions

panels.description: Total pipeline executions that are stuck in the last 10 mins.

targets.expr: sum(delta(stuck_node_executions_counter_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="harness-nextgen-free"}[10m]))

panels.title: Stuck Execution Delta

panels.description: Total pipeline executions successfully completed in last 10 minutes.

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status=~"SUCCEEDED|IGNORE_FAILED", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[10m]))) OR on() vector(0)
ceil(sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[10m]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Rate of Successful Executions

panels.description: Total pipeline executions failed in last 10 minutes.

targets.expr: ceil(sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status=~"FAILED|EXPIRED|ABORTED", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[10m]))) OR on() vector(0)
ceil(sum by(environment) (delta(pipeline_execution_end_count_total{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", edition="ENTERPRISE"}[10m]))) OR on() vector(0)

panels.title: Rate of Failed / Aborted Executions

targets.expr: sum by(environment) (delta(plan_creation_time_sum{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env"}[10m])) / 1000
sum by(environment) (delta(plan_creation_time_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env"}[10m]))

sum by(serviceName) (rate(io_harness_resources_responses_count{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", serviceName="pipeline-service", resource=~"ExecutionDetailsResource|PlanExecutionResource"}[5m]))

panels.title: Queued Task Count for Thread Pools [max]

targets.expr:
(sum by(streamName) (rate(event_queued_time_sum{cluster="$cluster", job="pipeline-service", environment="$env"}[10m])) / 1000)
/
(sum by(streamName) (rate(event_queued_time_count{cluster="$cluster", job="pipeline-service", environment="$env"}[10m])))

panels.title: Avg event queued time per stream

targets.expr:
(max by(eventType) (rate(event_process_time_sum{cluster="$cluster", job="pipeline-service", environment="$env"}[1m])) / 1000)
/
(max by(eventType) (rate(event_process_time_count{cluster="$cluster", job="pipeline-service", environment="$env"}[1m])))

max by(usecaseName) (rate(redis_streams_events_framework_deadletter_queue_size{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", usecaseName=~"pipeline_initiate_node|pipeline_interrupt|pipeline_node_advise|pipeline_node_start|pipeline_node_progress|pipeline_node_resume|pms_orchestration_notify_event|pipeline_orchestration|pipeline_sdk_response|pipeline_sdk_spawn|pipeline_sdk_step_response"}[5m]))
